DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Two Daily Wear Silicon Hydrogel Contact Lens
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize control study involve least 50 evaluable subject divide evenly among 5 study site Taiwan . Each study site enroll 12 subject least . The ration evaluable test subject control subject 2 1 . Subjects normal ocular health conform set standard criterion wear one study lenses two eye follow 3 month ( 90 day ) . Lenses assign subject accord predetermine randomized order . It necessary remove contact lens every day replace 30 day . Any unscheduled visit allow medication necessary . The data slit lamp finding , symptoms/problems/complaints , keratometry ( K ) reading , refractive change ( absolute value ) , visual acuity data , average wear time ( AWT ) , discontinuation , lens replacement collect claim VISCO Soft Contact Lens safe effective BIOFINITY ( comfilcon A ) Soft Contact Lens ( CooperVision ) .
DOC.criteria: Subject normal eye use ocular medication Subject 1.00 10.00 D myopia , less 1.25 D astigmatism VA correctable 20/25 better . Willing comply study procedure available duration study . Provide sign date informed consent form . Subjects history allergy would contraindicate solution use and/or `` normal '' contact lens wear . Cornea sensitivity low , high myope , Keratoconus , dry eye Schirmer Test < 5mm/5min physical condition would contraindicate contact lens wear . Subjects active ocular systemic disease would contraindicate contact lens wear . Subjects medication would contraindicate contact lens wear . Females pregnant , breastfeeding , birth control pill take intended become pregnant course study . Current drug alcohol use dependence would interfere adherence study requirement . Individuals participate clinical study .
